message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500. It's a fantastic opportunity for you, as it's worth $12,000 to you. Let me know your thoughts!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $11,000 for it.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $11,000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down slightly to $11,250.  It's a fair price considering the value you place on the product. Let me know if you're interested.
